attributes.action: Allow Marita moore founder of lotus fitness academy, to use her local park for fit camps to provide health and well being to local residents
attributes.additional_details:
I am a new small local business in stockport.
I wish to be able to use my local park for the purpose of training local people to help the get active get healthy reduce fat and lead longer healthier lives, whilst earning myself an honest living.
At present the council are putting the space out to tender for the highest bidder. This will result in only company's that are established and big enough to be able to afford it. It will also mean no one else can use it for this purpose.
I am happy to pay for the park use a reasonable cost that my business can afford, I also believe that local business should be able to utilise the park and would have no problems sharing the space with other providers.
Please help my cause by signing the petition so I can raise this issue
